description:
GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET is a flexible library that enables you to display documents and images of more than 45 file formats from within your web & mobile applications. The library is 100% independent and doesn't require any 3rd-party software installation. This allows end users to, for example, view PDF documents from within your .NET applications without having to install Adobe Reader.

With GroupDocs' document viewer for .NET, your app's users can view documents and images of the following file formats:

 - Portable Document Format: PDF
 - Microsoft Word: DOC, DOCX, DOCM, DOT, DOTX, DOTM
 - Microsoft Excel: XLS, XLSX, XLSM, XLSB
 - Microsoft PowerPoint: PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX
 - Microsoft Visio: VSD, VDX, VSS, VSX, VST, VTX, VSDX, VDW
 - Microsoft Project: MPP, MPT
 - Microsoft Outlook: MSG, EML, EMLX
 - OpenDocument Formats: ODT, OTT, ODS, ODP
 - Rich Text Format: RTF
 - Plain Text File: TXT
 - Comma-Separated Values: CSV
 - HyperText Markup Language: HTML, MHT, MHTML
 - Extensible Markup Language: XML
 - XML Paper Specification: XPS
 - AutoCAD Drawing File Format: DXF, DWG (2004)
 - Image files: BMP, GIF, JPG, PNG, TIFF, multi-page TIFF
 - Electronic publication: EPUB
 - Windows Icon: ICO

Documents can be both rasterized and converted to SVG+HTML+CSS, delivering high-fidelity native text rendering.

GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET comes with a convenient UI, which allows users to easily navigate documents when viewing them. For instance, users can scroll multi-page documents, turn pages with the Go Forward/Backward buttons, jump straight to a specified page, search for text within the document using keywords, preview pages with thumbnails, zoom, print and download documents right from a web-browser.

For more details on the GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET Library, please visit our website: 
http://groupdocs.com/dot-net/document-viewer-library

Note: this download contains a fully working version of the product, however without a license set it will run in evaluation mode with some limitations. To test GroupDocs' document viewer for .NET library without evaluation limitations, request a free 30-day temporary license.
releaseNotes:
We are pleased to share a new version of GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET, with the following improvements
New Features
WEB-1792	Added zh-CN and zh-TW localizations
WEB-1819	Added tr-TR localization

Bugs Fixed
WEB-662 	Unable to view the *.mhtml and *msg files in realtime-app
WEB-744 	The background of "Thumbs" panel isn't transparent in IE8
WEB-814 	Thumbnails are not hidden when loading a document
WEB-864 	"Evaluation" notification isn't display on the page if set "UseHtmlBasedEngine(true)" for unlicensed version
WEB-917 	White background of page is not displayed in IE 8
WEB-978 	Spinners are not fully displayed between pages with "UseHtmlBasedEngine(false)" option for specific zoom level
WEB-1023 	Setting "EnableRightClickMenu(false)" doesn't work with "UseHtmlBasedEngine(true)"
WEB-1046 	Extra symbols are displayed for particular HTML file
WEB-1047 	"Server Error in '/' Application" error occurs after attempt to download HTM file if set up ".DownloadPdfFileIfPossible(true)"
WEB-1049 	Parts of the loading spinner are visible behind image documents in HTML-based engine
WEB-1147 	User is able to view the 2nd page in trial mode after 15 views per hour with HTML-based engine
WEB-1148 	Dialog window with print progress is not hidden when print pop up was opened in FF
WEB-1157 	Tooltips for "Rotate Clockwise"/"Rotate Counter-Clockwise" buttons are not translated on Portuguese
WEB-1161 	Tooltips for some buttons are not translated on Norwegian
WEB-1198 	Second page is shifted in "Double page flip" mode for ViewCacheGenerationSignalRSample project
WEB-1200 	Extra pages are displayed in unlicensed version
WEB-1208 	Accent-insensitive search doesn't work for upper case with HTML-based engine
WEB-1320 	The width of pages are various for further pages and pages content are displayed incorrectly in IE after specific steps
WEB-1433 	Wide image is not fully displayed after page rotating
WEB-1564 	HTML thumbnails are not centered when pages have different widths
WEB-1706 	Can't view xlsm document with Macro enabled Excel Spreadsheet
WEB-1712 	Search doesn't work in some hebrew pdf documents
WEB-1723 	The text selection works incorrectly after rotating a page in the image mode
WEB-1758 	Trial message is not translated for localizations
WEB-1766 	Can't display several streams in the WebForms project
WEB-1767 	Tabs in Excel documents with many tabs are outside of the tab panel
WEB-1769 	Check if the example project will throw "Stack Overflow" error
WEB-1828 	WatermarkWidthInPercents doesn't work in image based mode
WEB-1829 	The search hit selection stops when hits have close vertical positions
WEB-1830 	The search works slowly in documents with many pages
WEB-1831 	Search hits are incorrect in the image mode for a specific document
WEB-1841 	"Unrecognized expression" when opening an Excel file in IE 9
WEB-1842 	Excel file: MaxJsonLength exceeded while tab content serialization
WEB-1849 	Aspose.Cells 8.5.1.0: Extra tabs in resultant HTML when converted from XLS and XLSX
WEB-1852 	A GetDocumentPageHtml request is sent when opening a document
WEB-1853 	Files are accessed directly instead of via storage providers in HtmlViewingService
summary: GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET is a flexible library that enables you to display documents and images of more than 45 file formats from within your web and mobile applications. The library is 100% independent and doesn't require any 3rd-party software installation.
title: GroupDocs.Viewer for .NET
